kd_tree::kd_incremental

kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_incremental Class Reference

Incremental hyperrectangle-hypersphere intersection calculator. Designed so that the object lifespan handles increments. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S = k_vector<vector_distance<T>, vector_distance<T> >>
class kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_incremental

Incremental hyperrectangle-hypersphere intersection calculator. Designed so that the object lifespan handles increments.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T , const unsigned int D, typename S >
kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_incremental::kd_incremental ( const kd_node *  node,
const kd_node *  parent,
kd_search_data &  search_data 
) [inline]

Create an temporary incremental calculator object. Will update the current data according with the selected branch.

Apply the incremental operations corresponding to traverse the tree by its left branch.

Parameters:
node Current node in the sub-hyperrectangular region.
parent Parent node that halves the hyperspace in two.
search_data Auxiliar data structure used for tree traversal and incremental calculations.
template<typename T , const unsigned int D, typename S >
kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_incremental::~kd_incremental (  )  [inline]

Destroy a temporary incremental calculator object. Will restore any previous modifications of the incremental data.

Restore the updated values to their previous ones, if modified.
